parameters.name: fromUtc
parameters.description: Format - date-time (as date-time in RFC3339). Gets or sets the start date and time in UTC for the filtering period.

parameters.name: toUtc
parameters.description: Format - date-time (as date-time in RFC3339). Gets or sets the end date and time in UTC for the filtering period.

parameters.name: leadType
parameters.description:
Gets or sets the type of lead for filtering purposes. Possible values are:

LeadType.Call
LeadType.WebBooking
LeadType.WebLeadForm
LeadType.ManualJob

If null, data for all lead types is returned.\
Values: [Call, WebBooking, WebLeadForm, ManualJob]

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Format - int32. The logical number of page to return, starting from 1

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Format - int32. How many records to return (50 by default)

parameters.name: includeTotal
parameters.description: Whether total count should be returned

parameters.name: performanceSegmentationType
parameters.description:
Gets or sets the type of performance segmentation for filtering purposes. Possible values are:

PerformanceSegmentationType.Campaign
PerformanceSegmentationType.AdGroup
PerformanceSegmentationType.Keyword\
Values: [Campaign, AdGroup, Keyword]

page.description: From which page this output has started

pageSize.description: Page size for this query (i.e. how many records were requested to return)

hasMore.description: True if there are more records in the query than returned in this result

totalCount.description: Total count of records for this query (can optionally be populated)

data.description: The collection of result items, will never have more than PageSize items

type.description: A URI reference that identifies the problem type

title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type

status.description: The HTTP status code generated by server

traceId.description: Internal trace ID for advanced diagnostics

errors.description: Provides more details about errors occurred, which can potentially be used for visual display

data.description: Provides additional data, intended for programmatical usage

ApiErrorResponse.description: Detailed error response, following RFC 7807 recommendations (https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7807).

webSessionData.description: The web session that the entity should be attributed to

landingPageUrl.description: The url of the web page that the user first landed on

referrerUrl.description: The url of the web page that referred to the website

googleAnalyticsClientId.description: An id used by Google Analytics to track unique visitors

Marketing.Ads.V2.WebSessionData.description:
Data from the web session used by the attribution system to determine the marketing campaign that
led the user to this particular web session.

customerPhoneNumber.description: The phone number of the customer

forwardingPhoneNumber.description: The ServiceTitan phone number that the external call tracking service will forward to

trackingPhoneNumber.description: The tracking phone number that the external call tracking service will display to the customer
